summary: Footage shot by a group of Swedish journalists documenting the Black Power Movement in the United States is edited together by a contemporary Swedish filmmaker.
cast: Abiodun Oyewole|Stokely Carmichael|Talib Kweli|Mable Carmichael|Ingrid Dahlberg|Martin Luther King|Questlove|Angela Davis|Harry Belafonte|King Gustaf VI Adolf|Coretta Scott King|Arnold Stahl|Malcolm X|Bertil Askelöf|Bo Holmström|Maggie Mailey|Erykah Badu|Sonia Sanchez|Eldridge Cleaver|Oerjan Oeberg|Kathleen Cleaver|Bobby Seale|Robin D.G. Kelley|Gerald Lefcourt|Knut Ståhlberg|Huey P. Newton|Lars Helander|Merrill Panitt|Richard Nixon|Emile de Antonio|William Kunstler|John Forte|Elaine Brown|Dennis Roberts|Lewis H. Michaux|Melvin Van Peebles|Courtney Callender|Louis Farrakhan|Vy Higginsen|Kenny Gamble|Raija Lounavaara|Cornel West
keywords: black power|drug|federal bureau of investigation|martin luther king jr. assassination|malcolm x
director: Director: Göran Olsson (as Göran Hugo Olsson)
title: The Black Power Mixtape 1967-1975
